channel.title: Team Needed (317) BattleZone
channel.description:
(SERVER) Welcome to the development of Battlezone, We are going to be a nice community with lots of players.We are going to try to get sponserd after we get enough players that we get a vps so no one has to host. This source/server is pkplanet and going to be turned inside out and modified big time. We will have skill capes with proper 100% emotes, Working d claws that hit x4, some customs not to many or that will ruin economy. Fully working skills ( except construction unless it is possible). 100% combat along with range mage. all GWD bosses. Jad and mabey a few custom bosses. There is so much more that will happen it will take too long to write so im cutting it short.
What We are Aiming For
What we are looking for in people We are looking for people that will dedicate some of there time into the server at least 4+hours a week at the lease not much as there is 7 days in a week. Please if you apply try to spend some time on if you get it. We are also looking for people that will that are kind and dont back stab or anything polit is a proper word for it and generous. There is no age limit but We really need mature people for this no 11 year olds that will goof off. although i said no age limit im going to recemend the age most people should be is ----------13+-------------
This is a respectful community if you share any work done here or give it to friends you will be removed.
Dev Team *Leader AND CODER* jedimatt84 web devo- Open web devo-Open Server Coder-Open Server Coder- Open client coder- Closed client coder- OPEN Beta tester-OPEN Beta tester-OPEN Graphics Dev- Open
If you want to be a server coder please apply with exp dont be a beginner. at least 2 months of coding exp any less dont apply this is serious.
If you want to be a client coder apply but you must know what you are doing, if you dont have much exp dont bother please and apply for something else(acceptions can be made)
If you want to apply for a Web Devo Make Have Exp as all the others and you must have made a website/ forums before.
Beta Tester? We only need 1-2 for now but there will be a beta when we get rolling but this is for our two main beta testers so apply for it if you know how to find glitches and bugs ect.
----STAFF--- This is something that will not be talked about on the forums as it can be against the rules so when you see the server up(not for a while) go to those forums and look and apply there
My Applacation Name: Age: Position Wanted: Experience in RSPS: Experience in Position Wanted: Email: Other contact INFO:

item.title: Team Needed (317) BattleZone
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I’ll be your coder 4 free I’m actually looked for someone who will let me help… I’m gr8 at coding if you don’t have a source I have a nice one I already built it I’m looking for a hoster soo if you wan’t I’ll help u coding the client and server. EMAIL me if u want meh belhelmiel@yahoo.com PS I’ve coded many java apps and 317 servers and if you let me help… your server will be a success. And I can get you a place to host .html files so ppl use your website that an html coder built and saved… it will have a subdomain name but its gr8…

Read full topic

item.title: Team Needed (317) BattleZone
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Your going to have to do a lot of programming for that source. I’m sure this is going to take a while, if I remember Pkplanet was removed for malicious coding, twice. Nevertheless, that is up to you to decide. Good luck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: Team Needed (317) BattleZone
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

jedimatt84:

If you want to be a server coder please apply with exp dont be a beginner. at least 2 months of coding exp any less dont apply this is serious.

Unless I’m wrong, 2 months of coding in Java is nowhere near enough to start developing a server. There’s a lot of complex concepts… concurrency, threading, networking to name a few… that need time to understand. Just a thought :).

Good luck on your server though.

Read full topic

                           (SERVER)

Welcome to the development of Battlezone, We are going to be a nice community with lots of players.We are going to try to get sponserd after we get enough players that we get a vps so no one has to host.
This source/server is pkplanet and going to be turned inside out and modified big time. We are looking for people that will dedicate some of there time into the server at least 4+hours a week at the lease not much as there is 7 days in a week.
